website_summaries.verdict: Popular and effective, reasonably priced, multi-use skincare oil for all types of skin.
pros: Improve appearance of uneven skin tone, dryness, and effects of aging
Free of formaldehyde, paraben, sulfate, and fluoride
Hypoallergenic, okay for sensitive skin, non-greasy, and non-comedogenic
Top product for treating stretchmarks, and winner of over 220 skincare awards
cons: Buyers must be patient and consistent with use to see product's benefits

customer_reviews.title: COPYCAT. NOT BIO-OIL!!!
customer_reviews.text: COPYCAT. NOT BIO-OIL. Please be cautious, I purchase and wondered what smelt weird, it was the oil. It smells fishy and just odd. I’ve purchased Bio-oil before and it DOES NOT smell like this. I actually enjoy the scent of original bio-oil. So upset.
customer_reviews.author: Rochelle - honest reviews

customer_reviews.title: Great for New Scars!
customer_reviews.text: So I've been using bio oil for about a month now and It seems to be working. My newest scars have definitely been improving but my old scars still seem to be pretty dark. My face does feel alot smoother and more moisturized. It hasn't been irritating my skin and it's a great moisturizer. I use a very little bit just to get a thin layer over my face then I apply my lotion on top. I've also been using African black soap and witch hazel so the combination of these things may have resulted in this outcome but overall I'd say it's a pretty good product as adding it to my routine has seemed to help.
customer_reviews.author: Amber

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: This is definitely NOT the actual Bio-Oil brand. Consistency and scent is very different.
customer_reviews.author: Both

customer_reviews.title: This was definitely not like the first bottle I bought
customer_reviews.text: This was definitely not like the first bottle I bought. It's maybe lasted 2 months compared to the bottle I got prior that last 6 months. The labeling is different and the consistency is diff. Will not buy again
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: FAKE !!! DO NOT BUY!!
customer_reviews.text: I have used bio oil for years. Love it, when its not counterfeit of course. This time I ordered it thru Amazon. The box was ripped and it appeared to be used, as there was no seal on the bottle. The consistency is watery and the color is a salmon pink instead of a more translucent orange color like the authentic version. Buy instead from target's offical website or an authorized retailer. Shame on amazon for giving such a large platform to counterfeit goods!
customer_reviews.author: Rachel Cantu

customer_reviews.title: Bio-Oil is the BEST skin product on the market
customer_reviews.text: Bio-Oil is the BEST skin product on the market. I use it as a twice a day, morning and before i go to bed. Small lines have disappeared. My skin is very smooth and seems to glow. A doctor recommended this to one of my friends who told me about it. I have bought several bottles as gifts.. Be patient. It will take a few months for you to see notice the changes. Now I am using it on my arms and hands. I hope have the same result. I am 71 years old. No one paid me to write this.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: This product is a fake, do not buy it ...
customer_reviews.text: This product is a fake, do not buy it. The color, logo and consistency is different than the one I bought at the store
customer_reviews.author: giulia vendramin

customer_reviews.title: Wow!
customer_reviews.text: I used this for 3 days and by the 4th day, I was floored. I noticed my skin had a "tighter" look and even younger. I wasn't expecting results like that. I also noticed that 2 freckles that have become blotches with age, are almost completely faded. That was definitely unexpected. My boyfriend actually commented on my face looking tighter and he had no idea I was using any new products, nor had I asked him if he noticed my face looking any different. He is now ordering Bio Oil. I am floored by this product and I am a huge skeptic on ny beauty care items being miracle makeovers. This is pretty darn close!
customer_reviews.author: Bevin Strickland

customer_reviews.title: This Product Works (A Man's Take)
customer_reviews.text: Men don't like to talk about it but we get stretch marks just the same as women do. I've had some weight gain and loss since childhood and it had left me with stretch marks that crippled my self esteem. I used this product infrequently a few years ago but noticed small results. I bought it again and have used the product twice daily for about 6 months. The discoloring on my stretch mark scarring has changed and now looks a lot more unnoticeable. I will definitely use this further in hopes time and effort will completely heal over the marks. I highly recommend it for anyone suffering from scars that they feel will never be gone. There's hope.
customer_reviews.author: YONATAN CARCHIDI

customer_reviews.title: I love this result. Keep using
customer_reviews.text: I use this for 1 month and it getting better.
customer_reviews.author: Ashley

customer_reviews.title: Smells Like Ship but with a T
customer_reviews.text: The Smell is hard to describe,... my first reaction was "Ewww ,this is what everyone is raving about ,im just not seeing iti" It has a weird , disturbing ,very synthetic wanna be cinnamon ( but not in a good way ,if that makes sense) top note ...followed by an old musty stale arcid ending .After reading the other reviews i cannot believe i missed the tons of bad reviews ,which confirm what i suspected .This is a complete and utter fake.My legs itched and it made no difference on my skin.This seller should not be allowed to sell a fake product here.Please save your money and buy from an authorized seller .
customer_reviews.author: A

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: This is the second time I’ve purchased Bio oil. I bought the small bottle the first time because I’m always sceptical of products with big claims. I am pleasantly surprised to find bio oil works very well on my skin. I mix it with my moisturizer products for my face. In a few days the Brown age spots began to fade. I wanted to make sure so I put just bio oil on brown spots on my arm. It worked!! I highly recommend this product.
customer_reviews.author: Loretta K. Smith

customer_reviews.title: This saved my skin!
customer_reviews.text: This product has changed my skin forever. I’ve been using it for a year and a half and my skin is better than ever. I mix mine with tea tree oil to treat my acne. It’s light, it smells great, and it treats existing skin damage. If you have sun damage, small wrinkles, discoloration, or acne scars you should give this six months and see if it works for you.
customer_reviews.author: Tricia Beck-Peter

customer_reviews.title: I especially love how this stuff doesn't stain my clothes after I ...
customer_reviews.text: I especially love how this stuff doesn't stain my clothes after I put it on. It soaks into my skin fast and has a pleasant smell. I use this for my pregnancy in which I am now on my last month of. All the women in my family have stretch marks, but I do not. I contribute this a lot to not only healthy eating habits but this oil as well. Of course I use different lotions with it (Burt's Bees and Body Merry) but I like to apply this after I get out of the shower for quick absorbing. Not only that but I am super happy it is cruelty free. Major plus if you ask me.
customer_reviews.author: Sarah

customer_reviews.title: Beware acne sufferers.
customer_reviews.text: Don't use it on your face especially if you're acne prone. Bought it to treat acne scars and it ended up breaking me out horribly and just making the situation worse. I looked it up on cosdna.com per my dermatologists reccommendation and it has ingredients in it that are acne causing as well as irritating. It would maybe be fine on the rest of your body but I don't really need it. Going to give it to someone.
customer_reviews.author: Markie

customer_reviews.title: Best thing for my skin
customer_reviews.text: I’ve been using bio oil for years, mostly on my face. I used to have scars along my chin where I had a ton of breakouts, but they’re all but gone now! I have a different skin regime for my face now, so I use it mostly on my body due to pregnancy. It keeps my skin supple and I have not noticed any additional stretch marks. If you’re wanting to use this to get rid of scars, remember it’s a process and will take months, but it definitely pays off!
customer_reviews.author: TaralynGoya

customer_reviews.title: Bio-Oil believer
customer_reviews.text: When I first used this I was appalled that it was mineral oil, which I never use. And in research found that Purcellin is a made up name for who knows what, but after using it, I can say that my dark spots are fading and I've been using it for only a matter of weeks. My skin looks better and feels soft and healthy. Who knew? Anyway, I'm a believer and have recommended it to friends.
customer_reviews.author: Flora Fonda

customer_reviews.title: Great product!
customer_reviews.text: Wifey: I love this oil!!! I got this oil when I was pregnant and smeared it all over my belly. Roughly three times a day. After having my baby I got Zero stretch marks. Now, I can not give full credit to this oil but it has a huge role in it, I think. I had stretch marks before my pregnancy, so I was adamant to do whatever I can to hopefully prevent it from developing on my belly. I highly recommend this product. Note- I did not notice that it reduced stretch marks appearance that are already there.
customer_reviews.author: AsH

customer_reviews.title: Trusted and tested
customer_reviews.text: This is probably my 12ty bottle. I used to buy at Walgreens for double the price! I’m glad amazon sells them. I use this for my stretch marks from being pregnant. Also on my heels to prevents ugly dry cracked heels. I love how subtle the smell is. Oh and I’ve also used it when i was pregnant. I slathered them food on my belly and I guess that’s why I only have super small and faint stretch marks because of it.
customer_reviews.author: Xutzen

customer_reviews.title: Significant reduction in age spots
customer_reviews.text: I'm the most skeptical person I know but I had heard great things about bio oil so I bought it. I have been using on one arm for about 3 weeks and even after week 1 the difference was so noticeable I decided to use on the other arm as well. My age spots have gone from embarrassingly noticeable to almost non existent. I could not be more thrilled. Telling everyone woman I know about bio oil. I am 100% on board with the greatness of this product.
customer_reviews.author: Terri A. Agy

customer_reviews.title: Helps reduce surgical scar
customer_reviews.text: Best advice was from a dermatological nurse I happened to meet at my surgeon's office. Her daughter had just had surgery also. Her advice: Use BioOil daily on surgical scar once wound is healed, rub in the direction of the scar (not across it), and do not expose the scar to sunlight - for at least 6 months. This advice was very helpful. I now also use BioOil on my skin after showering. It is wonderful.
customer_reviews.author: Mary Ryan

customer_reviews.title: Awesome stuff!
customer_reviews.text: This stuff is awesome. I get dry patches on my face in the winter and since using this, no more dry patches! I have pretty sensitive skin and I can't use most creamy moisturizers because I'll break out, Bio-Oil adds the moisture I need without breaking me out. It also helps to reduce old acne scars and evens out my skin tone. As an added benefit, the smell is light and clean!
customer_reviews.author: Lydia

customer_reviews.title: Seems to be working great!
customer_reviews.text: I’ve tried a lot of products to remove blemishes on my back. It’s the only place I have scarring, etc from acne (bacne) and a bad spout with picking from particular extracurriculars. With that said-and well into recovery-this stuff seems to be working. I pair it with aloe Vera gel and coconut oil. I think between that combo, it’s finally beginning to clear! I say give it a try! And leave us all a review in a month or so of use.
customer_reviews.author: Marcus Fritz

customer_reviews.title: I replace all other face product with this
customer_reviews.text: I really don't enjoy doing the work to take care of my skin. When I do, I don't always enjoy the feeling of the product... and I've tried a lot since my mom keeps getting me different ones to try... both Asian and American products. This is the only one thing I actually enjoy using. My skin definitely is doing better. The scars are fading, my face is moisturized for a long time. AND it doesn't feel excessicely oily. Your skin absorbs the oil fast and it just feel more moist and smooth.
customer_reviews.author: An

customer_reviews.title: 5 stars!
customer_reviews.text: I'm 27 and still struggling with acne and the scarring that comes with it. After one use of this over night I was pretty shocked the next day, my skin texture and acne itself looked noticeably better. It's now been only three days since I've been using this before bed time and I'm just amazed how clear, how soft, and how it's less oily my skin is throughout the day. Only slightly negative thing is I'm just not crazy about the smell, reminds me of an older ladies perfume because of the rose in it. Regardless this stuff is awesome and cant wait to see the out come of using it long term!
customer_reviews.author: Stephanie Fifolt

customer_reviews.title: Must treatment for scars after surgery- what a relief it gave me
customer_reviews.text: I love the bio oil. Has tremendously helped my dry skin. I use it daily on my feet, arms, face, eyes, and works great I’ve had foot surgery and it is helped with my scars to ease some of the sensitive skin. This is my must treatment.
customer_reviews.author: kim anderson

customer_reviews.title: Must have for during and after pregnancy.
customer_reviews.text: I’ve been using this product for years on my face for left over acne scars/ skin tone. When I got pregnant I started using it on my chest, stomach, thighs, and bum area. Basically all the areas that can potentially swell when you are making a baby! Now I continue to use it on my stomach and c-section scar. Has worked great for sun burns/damage too.
customer_reviews.author: Jules P.

customer_reviews.title: New look same formula
customer_reviews.text: So I was a little skeptical about purchasing after seeing reviews but decided to give it a try. Obviously, you can tell it was a success!! I ordered the 4oz and received just that. The box is the most updated version which is a plus (checked other retailers aka Target). After giving birth I had numerous issues this has helped me with including discoloration, stretch marks (new and old) plus my surgical scar. Well, FOR ME ( everyone’s body is different) within the 1st wk the discoloration started clearing up and I have also noticed my scar was looking so much better!!! still working on the stretch marks 2 times a day faithfully!!
customer_reviews.author: corina gamez

customer_reviews.title: New & Forever Favorite
customer_reviews.text: Omg this stuff is the BEST! I kept reading about it in Buzzfeed articles on skincare and I finally decided to give it a try. So glad I did! Not only is it one of the best facial moisturizers I've ever used (yes, I totally replaced my moisturizer with this), but it also helps SO MUCH with dark spots from acne. Will definitely be using this forever.
customer_reviews.author: TerraDactyl

customer_reviews.title: Lotion smells nice and soften skin.
customer_reviews.text: I mixed the oil with Whole Foods lotion and it helps my skin stay soft and smell nice. The scent is so calming. It helps falling asleep easily. I almost finish my 2nd bottom.
customer_reviews.author: Nguyet Luong

customer_reviews.title: I love this oil.
customer_reviews.text: I bought this oil to help reduce some acne scarring I had on my face. I say all the reviews and gave it a try. I love this oil. It smells really nice and it goes on smooth and doesnt feel greasy AT ALL. I put this on after a day in the sun and it helped calm the skin. It also helped with dry skin from being in the pool. I recently bought my second bottle. I love this stuff!
customer_reviews.author: Guzmanna

customer_reviews.title: This Is the Best Product Ever!
customer_reviews.text: I use this for personal use and every winter I get sores in side my nose. I take a Q-tip and this product is a MIRACLE WORKER! This is the first year I have had NO SORES in my nose. It also works great on getting scars too lighten up on your body. GREATEST PRODUCT SINCE SLICED BREAD!!!!!!!!!!!
customer_reviews.author: Michael

customer_reviews.title: kind of a sweet deal!
customer_reviews.text: Someone told me once I started showing that they utilized this brand to keep their skin integrity intact. I have used it once or twice a day daily and am currently 28 weeks pregnant and do not have any stretch marks. I’ve also gained about 30 pounds and it’s all in my belly so I’m huge. Even though stretch marks are genetic, I have stretch marks all over my inner And outer thighs as well as up the sides of my hips from being overweight in junior high. So I’m prone to getting stretch marks but haven’t received any from this pregnancy, kind of a sweet deal!
customer_reviews.author: Holly

customer_reviews.title: Awesome for my daughters legs
customer_reviews.text: I love this stuff for my 5 year old daughter, she has a bad habit of scratching until she gets a scab then scratching the scab off which creates ugly scars. Rubbing this on her legs daily has cleared her existing scars and helped hear scabs before she can pick them off.
customer_reviews.author: S. Johnson

customer_reviews.title: Amazing Product at a Fantastic Price
customer_reviews.text: Great product and actually does what it claims. Truly improves skins moisture and improves the look of stretch marks and scars
customer_reviews.author: Cora Rose

customer_reviews.title: Worth the price
customer_reviews.text: I wasn't sure about buying this at first, but took the risk based off of all the good results I've read about. I tend to be heavy handed with products and thankfully after a month of using this, the bottle is still basically full. I have normal type skin, but wanted to use this for my uneven skin tones and skin tags. After a month of using it, my skin looks a lot more even! It looks more youthful and has really helped with the bags under my eyes. Didn't really help with my skin tags, but overall I really like it and have noticed a difference in my skin.
customer_reviews.author: Tori

customer_reviews.title: Good product
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this to use on scars from a surgery. I used this nightly, massaged it on the scars. During the day I wore silicone scar sheets. I am almost a year post-op now and my scars are somewhat visible but definitely an improvement, they no longer bother me. This product comes in an easy to use bottle. Faint smell, did not bother me. My skin did feel slightly greasy afterward though. I would recommended using at night after a shower and waiting a few minutes to dress. The bottle lasts a long time
customer_reviews.author: hollyb28

customer_reviews.title: No stretch marks here!
customer_reviews.text: Used daily after the shower to prevent stretch marks during my pregnancy. Both my mother and sister have terrible stretch marks as a result of their pregnancies. After using this product I am so glad to say I don’t have a single stretch mark. I ended up having an emergency c-section at 38 weeks due to Hurricane Michael. I’ve used this product on my c-section scar and, after 3 weeks, can hardly see the incision line. I’m so glad I used this product and would definitely recommend!!
customer_reviews.author: Laurie Cothran

customer_reviews.title: Miracle oil!
customer_reviews.text: This is by far the BEST skin care i have found. I have sun damaged skin and it has helped more than anything i have used. If used as directed it will not only fade scars, it will also fade brown spots. I use this twice daily and have been using for probably a year now and see a remarkable difference in my skins appearance. I use instead of lotion,as it absorbs really well.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: I love bio oil
customer_reviews.text: A little goes a long way!!! I love bio oil. I have been using it for 2-3 weeks now and I have already seen a lot of improvement in my skin. I have very fair skin and it scars very easily, and I used to have so many dark spots around my mouth. This product has helped so much! I use it only at night because it is too oily for my oily skin to wear during the day.
customer_reviews.author: A. Simic

customer_reviews.title: My Bi-racial daughter in law recommended it to me
customer_reviews.text: My arm was burned the skin was pink in some places and black in others. It has returned my skin almost to its normal dark pigment in just 6weeks of using. I also use it on my face and it has started to lift my dark age spots. I am African American with a dark complexion. My Bi-racial daughter in law recommended it to me.
customer_reviews.author: Lynn

customer_reviews.title: Amazing product for scars! Must have!
customer_reviews.text: Amazing product and I work in dermatology!! Used this when I found out I was pregnant right after removing a mole on my abdomen. Was so afraid my scar would stretch with my growing abdomen. No joke, after 5 months of twice a day application, it’s GONE! I can’t even see where it was! I will definitely be recommending this over any other otc scarring product.
customer_reviews.author: F. Michelle Bowling

customer_reviews.title: You need this.
customer_reviews.text: This stuff is a god send. It works for everything mentioned. I understand ppls worry about a copycat, but ive bought this product on multiple occassions, and it works great! Ive never had an issue where it smells like a different product. My skin has never reacted to it negatively so I think this is the real deal.
customer_reviews.author: Jackie

customer_reviews.title: Would buy again.
customer_reviews.text: I love this oil.... don’t actually know for sure if it helps yet. It’s the second time I’ve bought it. And I wanna say that I think it does help. I like the smell and the way it feels as well. Wish it wasn’t so expensive though.
customer_reviews.author: Mariah

customer_reviews.title: Reduces Dark Spots and Makes My Skin Look Younger
customer_reviews.text: We spend a lot of hours outside in the sun for my kids' sports, especially in the summer for travel baseball. I noticed after this season my arms were developing several "sun spots". I started using this oil and noticed a difference in less than two weeks. Then within a couple more weeks, I noticed my hands were looking a lot younger and smoother. I really love this oil and it's a part of my daily regimen for skin care. It has made a significantly, noticeable difference and I am very pleased with the results.
customer_reviews.author: Sherrmor74

customer_reviews.title: BELIEVE THE HYPE! Must have for C Section Moms
customer_reviews.text: I did not believe the hype about this product but omg it really works. My C section scar is so light after a 2 months of use and the itchiness and discomfort I had around the area was gone within a day. Get it C section moms!
customer_reviews.author: IBFab

customer_reviews.title: Great during pregnancy
customer_reviews.text: This was recommended to me by a friend to use during pregnancy. It never irritated my skin, and I'm now in my 9th month without any stretch marks or significant changes to my skin (and my belly has expanded a lot). Obviously our genes (and some luck) play into this sort of thing, but all I know is that I used this every morning starting around month 3 (along with lotion in the evening) and felt it was a great way to moisturize. One bottle lasts a long time, and there is no lingering smell on your skin.
customer_reviews.author: Jenn

customer_reviews.title: This was top 3 recommend in an article
customer_reviews.text: After getting breast surgery, I got big, red stretch marks on the sides of my DDs. I freaked out & googled any way possible to get rid of them. This was top 3 recommend in an article. For the price I said it’s worth a try. LET ME TELL YOU... this stuff did wonders for me. It faded out my stretch marks with in 4-6 weeks. Plus it smells great!
customer_reviews.author: B

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: I have used this throughout my pregnancy. I apply It after I’m done with my shower and then I do a little rinse and pat dry with a towel. I feel like this product has kept my skin less itchy and irritated throughout the winter, and it has helped with the rough bumps I get From dry skin.
customer_reviews.author: Robert Renfro

customer_reviews.title: Smells good, moisturizes well
customer_reviews.text: The smell of this is amazing - however it does not work so well for stretch marks. Also, I noticed that this is NOT mostly natural as mineral oil is first on the list of ingredients. I would definitely buy again because it blends into your skin quickly and won’t leave residue stains on your clothing, and it makes your skin feel so nice once it’s been absorbed.
customer_reviews.author: Ocean

customer_reviews.title: It smells really nice and you don't need much
customer_reviews.text: At first I was skeptical after reading the reviews but for the price I decided to try it. It smells really nice and you don't need much, and I have seen some results and I don't use it as much as I should because I always forget. I even use it on my face where proactive has failed. I suffer from chronic pain and am unable to exercise so I even ordered one of those little massage cups to use with it.
customer_reviews.author: KaLee

customer_reviews.title: but extremely happy with the results
customer_reviews.text: Bought because it was on sale, but extremely happy with the results! I have a good cluster of acne scars on my cheeks and within a week or two saw a noticeable difference in how little you could see the scars.
customer_reviews.author: Samantha

customer_reviews.title: Highly recommend, smells great and does what it says!
customer_reviews.text: Love love love!! Smells great and keeps you moisturized all day! Stop your skin from itching and all around great product. I have been using it my entire pregnancy. Once in the morning and again before bed. I’ve noticed that when I don’t use it, that’s when I feel my skin get a little itchy but once I put a little on, dry skin is gone. Absorbs really well too so it’s not messy on your clothes. You can get dressed right after applying. Best skin oil ever! I will use this even after baby.
customer_reviews.author: Maltese Love

customer_reviews.title: yes, it is as good as they say it is :)
customer_reviews.text: obsessed! yes, it is as good as they say it is. :) in my 3rd trimester, measuring slightly above average, and still no stretch marks! dries quick too so when you're in a hurry, zero concern for oil to get on clothes. feels light, skin looks great. preggers suggestions: breasts, belly, love handles, inner and outer thighs. i use a shea lotion for the rest of my body to ration this product, so focus the good stuff on the most susceptible areas.
customer_reviews.author: A. Allen

customer_reviews.title: My new go to
customer_reviews.text: My dad has cancer and with the muscle loss his skin has become very very fragile, he started using this and when visiting him one day i rubbed this on his arms and I fell in love with it so I had to order some. I love to use this product after getting out of the shower. After rubbing in well there is no greasiness and my skin is so soft.
customer_reviews.author: Robin

customer_reviews.title: Good Product
customer_reviews.text: Smell is quite strong, but it is a good oil and really helps my stretch marks appear less red.
customer_reviews.author: Ocy

customer_reviews.title: Exceptional!
customer_reviews.text: My daughter used this during pregnancy to avoid stretch marks and it worked I tried it about a year ago and I love it too. I had a toenail fungus problem that nothing seemed to work. Bio oil worked so good. I have 3/4 of my new nail back without any fungus problem. It also works great on your feet keeping them soft with no problems.
customer_reviews.author: J Pircio

customer_reviews.title: Can't Stop Using
customer_reviews.text: I love this product more than any of my other products. It's so smooth, but I don't feel like I'm clogging up my pores. I feel like my skin is getting the moisture it needs. I use it at night, in the morning, after a shower, to take my makeup off... everything.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Worked for me with Skinception
customer_reviews.text: Used this in combination with skinception because bio-oil is much more affordable, alternating between products (one in the morning and one in the evening) and it has drastically improved my stretch marks. It's been several months, they haven't disappeared completely but they aren't as visible.
customer_reviews.author: Maddie

customer_reviews.title: So far so good. Been using for years.
customer_reviews.text: Great product. Not too greasy. Just perfect. Hopefully quality remains consistent
customer_reviews.author: James Y U

customer_reviews.title: ... prevent stretch marks during both my pregnancies and I love it. I love how it smells
customer_reviews.text: I use this to prevent stretch marks during both my pregnancies and I love it. I love how it smells, I love how it feels, just make sure to let it dry a bit because its definitely oily. I had zero stretch marks the first time and am hoping to repeat it for this pregnancy. A+
customer_reviews.author: Char

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful for pregnancy.
customer_reviews.text: Started using this the minute I found out I was pregnant. I was very fortunate to not get any stretch marks, and hopefully this product helped. A little goes a long way and I only used two bottles my whole pregnancy. Also, this price is much cheaper than Walgreens.
customer_reviews.author: Kristin

customer_reviews.title: Luxury feeling!
customer_reviews.text: Idk if this works but it makes my skin feel really lux!
customer_reviews.author: Morgan

customer_reviews.title: THIS IS A MUST BUY FOR SCARS!!!!!
customer_reviews.text: I had a total knee replacement and a friend recommended this for my scar. I have used this 2X daily and my scar is almost gone at 4 months post surgery! My orthopedic surgeon was very impressed by the healing of my scar so early.
customer_reviews.author: MC1983

customer_reviews.title: I believe this is more effective than regular Mederma and ...
customer_reviews.text: I believe this is more effective than regular Mederma and nighttime Mederma. I have an especially stubborn scar that I've had for almost a year, it is getting lighter, but it is still very visible. With that said, be consistent and apply regularly for months to see progress.
customer_reviews.author: buyer

customer_reviews.title: Love this for pregnancy!!
customer_reviews.text: I used this during my first pregnancy! I started using it in the second trimester, usually only 1x per day and then used it 2x per day during my 3rd trimester when I could remember. In the end I had gained about 35lb and had 1 small dime sized stretch mark around my hip area (where I didn’t apply Bio Oil as often/regularly. Even my OB commented on how surprised he was that I didn’t have any stretch marks! Super pleased with this purchase. Pleasant scent, rubs in easily. Will definitely use again if we are fortunate enough to have more children!!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: This is a nice light oil that doesn’t make your skin feel greasy at all! Absorbs nicely! I’m currently 38wks pregnant and started using this very early on. I know most stretch marks tend to be genetic. However, this is my 2nd child and I have No knew marks!! It’s also helped diminish a big scar on my knee. I’m a believer! I bought on amazon b/c it was $10 more at any store I found it at!
customer_reviews.author: Tasha

customer_reviews.title: Buy this brand! No stretch marks and about 8 months pregnant.
customer_reviews.text: Almost 8 months pregnant and putting this on religiously every night and some mornings too. I am carrying very big where people asked me at 6 and a half months if I am about to give birth. I do not have one stretch mark and believe all thanks are owed to this product. I've already placed another order for 2 more large bottles!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: PREVENTS STRETCH MARKS! START EARLY!
customer_reviews.text: This is a MUST HAVE for expecting mamas.... I used this two-thirds times a day during my pregnancy starting at month 2 and have NO STRETCH MARKS on my tummy!!!! I gained 65 lbs this pregnancy too!! My body stretched at full capacity very quickly, yet this oil truly truly helped prevent stretch marks... highly recommend using coco butter with it!
customer_reviews.author: Lauren R

customer_reviews.title: No stretch mark so far
customer_reviews.text: I used this product since beginning of 2nd trimester. Daily use apply on my tummy after shower. So far I don’t have any stretch mark. And I brought another bottle. The only thing I don’t like it very much is the perfume seems a bit too strong for pregnant women.
customer_reviews.author: Kim

customer_reviews.title: Can already see a difference after a handful of uses
customer_reviews.text: Although I just started to use Bio Oil I can already see a visible difference in my stretch marks. The redness has begun to subside and my skin feels soft. Looking forward to incorporating this into my daily routine, so far the results are promising!
customer_reviews.author: Val Kilmer's Mom

customer_reviews.title: Magical Oil
customer_reviews.text: Every woman (and man!) needs this stuff. I have had stretch marks on my legs since I was 13, and I feel like after using this for about 2 weeks they have started to fade. I put this on my inner thighs, breasts and scars I have on my face and it is seriously a magical oil. I would recommend this for someone who is pregnant or has irritating stretch marks.
customer_reviews.author: shannon oconnor

customer_reviews.title: Healer
customer_reviews.text: Healed my surgical scar beautifully!! Nice in Have in the winter
customer_reviews.author: Marty

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful skin oil.
customer_reviews.text: I use it as legs oil, or anywhere I need extra moisture. Smells great too, absorbs very quickly and doesn't leave skin feeling greasy.
customer_reviews.author: Gosia M.

customer_reviews.title: Heals scars fast!
customer_reviews.text: Someone recommended this oil to me after I had thyroid surgery. Remarkably, it has significantly lightened my scar in the month I have been using it. I apply this product twice a day (sometimes only once when I go to bed). HIGHLY recommended!
customer_reviews.author: KReb1012

customer_reviews.title: Great for preventing stretch marks
customer_reviews.text: This is genuine bio oil. It is the same packaging that Target has and is the same color and smell. Thanks to this stuff, I went through my entire pregnancy without stretch marks and it has greatly reduced the appearance of my c section scar in just a few months! Absolutely swear by this!
customer_reviews.author: Nagnot

customer_reviews.title: Can’t wait to start using it
customer_reviews.text: I Read many positive reviews and some negative reviews saying that the product wasn’t original that it was fake so I went to target and I purchased a small one it’s Identical and smells exactly the same. I will post pictures of my results when I start using it.
customer_reviews.author: mm

customer_reviews.title: Great for pregnancy!
customer_reviews.text: I use this every day after I shower. It helps keep stretch marks from forming and makes my skin feel so soft and wonderful!
customer_reviews.author: Katie R

customer_reviews.title: Much better than cocoa butter
customer_reviews.text: Got this as a gift when I was first pregnant. Really reduced my stretch marks and helped me not get any new ones. Much better than cocoa butter. Not greasy and quickly absorbed in the skin. I have pretty dry skin as it is, but this got me through the winter. Loved it so much, I bought another bottle for myself when I ran out.
customer_reviews.author: PaintedLaS

customer_reviews.title: Prevents stretch marks!!
customer_reviews.text: I used this during pregnancy for my stretch marks. I liked it so much I ordered another one. I put it on right after I got out of the shower, before I dried off. I put it EVERYWHERE I thought of. I’m now six weeks postpartum, and no stretch marks! I plan to keep using it as it is very moisturizing too!
customer_reviews.author: Trisha Gingery

customer_reviews.title: I'm pretty happy with it
customer_reviews.text: I started using this Bio-Oil since my second trimester so far no stretch marks. I'm pretty happy with it. We also used it as a massage oil and it works.
customer_reviews.author: ENoble

customer_reviews.title: Bio Oil has a great smell, not too strong or overwhelming and the ...
customer_reviews.text: Bio Oil has a great smell, not too strong or overwhelming and the oil is rapidly absorbed into my skin. A little does go a long way but it spreads better right after a shower for me. It doesn't work well if your skin is dry (at least, not for me) which is why I use it right after the shower. It leaves my skin very soft. I just started using it but many report it has lightened stretch marks and scars.
customer_reviews.author: Kelkatan

customer_reviews.title: I was super worried about getting stretch marks during my pregnancy
customer_reviews.text: I was super worried about getting stretch marks during my pregnancy, especially because I had them on my boobs, lower back, and thighs from my adolescence. At two months I started using this morning and night, and made it to my delivery at 39 weeks exactly with zero stretch marks. I gained right about 40 pounds total. I’m not 100% positive that I skipped the stretch marks entirely due to this product, but I’m personally pleased with the results!
customer_reviews.author: Amanda Lacy

customer_reviews.title: Works - no stretch marks with a twin pregnancy
customer_reviews.text: During my previous pregnancies I used other lotions and oils to avoid stretch marks and was fortunate to only have a few relatively small stretch marks. When I found out I was pregnant with twins I began looking online for products with good reviews and came across this product and decided to give it a try. I used this religiously at least twice a day starting in the beginning of my second trimester up until my delivery date. It worked wonders! I didn’t get any stretch marks during this pregnancy and gained a significant amount of more weight with my twins than with my single pregnancies. I recommend this oil to all my pregnant friends now.
customer_reviews.author: A. Chavez

customer_reviews.title: Not Authentic produact
customer_reviews.text: This is not the authentic product the bottle is very different.And smell weird.I’ve been using bio are you open on throughout the years and I’ve never had a break out on my skin ever and no smell until today, when I put a little bit on my hands and wrists .it cause my skin to itch and 2 small bubbles up as you can see on my right wrist.I’ll send it right back. Never again will Purchased this product from Amazon I will go to Walgreens or CVS Purchase their original one.
customer_reviews.author: MONIQUE TM.

customer_reviews.title: Favorite Skin Care Item
customer_reviews.text: This is my favorite skin care item by far. it has dramatically decreased the acne scars on my face, cleared up my skin, and diminished the appearance of stretch marks on my legs. I recommend this product to everyone, it actually does what it says it does!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Miracle oil
customer_reviews.text: This oil is honestly incredible. It actually works. I use it for my deep stretch marks and scarring on my stomach and thighs. It has a nice powdery smell too. The only thing is it is very greasy, but worth the trouble! I see some reviewers are saying that they received a fake product, and their pictures confirm that.. for that reason, I would say probably safer to purchase direct rather than through the Amazon seller.
customer_reviews.author: Mallerina

customer_reviews.title: ... am pregnant and bought this because I heard it's amazing to help prevent stretch marks
customer_reviews.text: I am pregnant and bought this because I heard it's amazing to help prevent stretch marks. I currently am mixing it with shea tummy butter and putting it on my stomach, breast, thighs, and butt. It smells great. I plan on using it twice a day.
customer_reviews.author: Theresa

customer_reviews.title: Awesome product great for stretch marks
customer_reviews.text: I got this to use after vericose vein treatment on my legs. Works great! But even better I decided to use it on my 25 year old tummy stretch marks as well and...they actually have aost disappeared after 6 weeks of nightly application. Pretty amazing!!
customer_reviews.author: Texanlovestotravel

customer_reviews.title: Great Product!!!
customer_reviews.text: I recently had a surgical procedure that left me with a fairly serious looking scar on my neck. Unfortunately due to its location it’s highly visible. I believe the surgeon did his best to minimize the visual effect but it is still out there none the less. This seems to really make a difference in hiding/reducing the appearance of the scar. It’s been about 3 months and the difference has been incredible. The scent is light and pleasant and does not overwhelm your senses.
customer_reviews.author: CCB

customer_reviews.title: After hearing good things about Bio- Oil
customer_reviews.text: After hearing good things about Bio- Oil, I purchased & have used this for the past week in attempt to ward of the stretch marks I am expecting with my pregnancy. I am trying the 2oz option (rather than committing to a larger bottle) to see if I like it. Pro - I like the scent; it almost smells like honeysuckle. Con - it's not cruelty free & I wish I had researched that better before purchasing. I will look for a cruelty free product next time. As for quality of the product, I cannot comment as I have not been using it long enough. It does moisturize very well and has staying power.
customer_reviews.author: CD

customer_reviews.title: Check the ingredients before buying
customer_reviews.text: This product is loaded w petroleum and mineral oil which is a big no no.. after using this product on my belly for a week My entire belly broke out in small hives/pimples. Only after switching to organic oil the hives went away... i would not recommend this product for kids or expecting moms
customer_reviews.author: Christin Chang

customer_reviews.title: Pregnancy stretch marks- non-existing with this as it’s barrier!
customer_reviews.text: This oil is the best for preventing pregnancy stretch marks & dry skin! I used this everyday on my belly & other dry areas & it prevented any stretch marks that I know otherwise would have appeared, which is why I’ve ordered the large bottle for my second pregnancy.
customer_reviews.author: Richard Salazar

customer_reviews.title: I’ve been using this product since my first 1st pregnancy ...
customer_reviews.text: I’ve been using this product since my first 1st pregnancy. I’m currently on my 2nd pregnancy. I didn’t have any stretch marks but I know that stretch marks can be genetic. This item doesn’t leave ur skin too oily. I also use it for my cuticles when they are dry and helps restore them.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Holy Grail of Body Oils!!!
customer_reviews.text: Discovered during pregnancy & have been using it daily ever since. I apply it after showering all over my abdomen, hips, thighs. I've found this product to reduce & prevent stretch marks during & following pregnancy. The oil has a light fresh scent which quickly fades. It is super hydrating & quickly absorbs with no greasy residue. Well worth the price - best price on Amazon!
customer_reviews.author: Mei Lene Thai Ranada

customer_reviews.title: I love Bio-Oil and I was so glad to see it ...
customer_reviews.text: I love Bio-Oil and I was so glad to see it in such a big bottle. This product is amazing for reducing scars and stretch marks--not just fading them they actually are reducing the depth of some of my deeper stretch marks they are almost completely even with the surrounding skin and I have only been through a little over half the 2 oz size bottle. I apply a little twice a day and exfoliate the areas with a scrub twice a week and I have seen amazing progress in less than a month. I would highly recommend this product.
customer_reviews.author: Jessica Herren

customer_reviews.title: Amazing
customer_reviews.text: This stuff is amazing! I use it everyday. Now I do not use it on my face because I don't want to use an oil on my oily face. But just on the body it soaks in nicely and leave your skin just super soft. I need to repurchase some soon!
customer_reviews.author: C. Edwards

customer_reviews.title: No anti-tampering protection for consumer
customer_reviews.text: Purchased but did not apply product, so cannot attest to its effectiveness. Product just arrived with multi-item shipment. Product packaging crushed and slightly opened. No adhesive anti-tampering product seal on the outside of box. No product anti-tampering seal on bottle or under screw top cap. No anti- tampering protection seal of any kind on this product. I threw it in the trash. Zero stars.
customer_reviews.author: True Blue Texan

customer_reviews.title: It simply doesn't work.
customer_reviews.text: I had high hopes for this product as it was very well recommended. However, it didn't work for me at all. No lighter color, no smaller scars or stretch marks. I used it in several areas of different sizes. It just didn't work for me. I wouldn't recommend it to anyone. The color of oil I got is MUCH lighter than the original bottles my friends and family have as well. I think this may be part of the problem. Maybe I got a bad batch or maybe the seller is being deceptive. Who knows. Didn't work though.
customer_reviews.author: Tasha

customer_reviews.title: Amazing
customer_reviews.text: I used it it’s helping to get out of your markes
customer_reviews.author: samaher

product_meta.title: Bio-Oil Skincare Oil, 6.7 Ounce, Body Oil for Scars and Stretch Marks, Hydrates Skin, Non-Greasy, Dermatologist Recommended, Non-Comedogenic, For All Skin Types, with Vitamin A, E
product_meta.description: Style Name:Body Oil for Scars and Stretchmarks| Size:6.7 Fl OzGive your skin a break while stuck inside! It's the perfect time to take care of your skin with Bio-Oil Skincare Oil. Made for all skin types, this skincare oil can be used to help reduce the appearance of stretch marks, scars, and other marks due to surgery, injury, acne, aging, pregnancy, and more. Its fast-absorbing, non-comedogenic formula won't clog pores. It helps the skin to retain essential moisture to soften skin and provide dry skin relief. It's truly a multiuse oil that's recommended by skin care specialists. The toxicological profile, chemical structure, level of inclusion and total level of daily exposure of each ingredient used has been assessed and deemed safe for use (including for use by pregnant women).
feature_bullets: Improves appearance of scars and stretch marks - Clinically proven and dermatologist recommended to help repair skin damage and scars from pregnancy, surgery, injury, acne, C-section, aging, and more. So if you have extra time to organize your skin care cabinet, keep bio-oil front and center

Carefully formulated body oil - Vitamin E helps maintain healthy looking skin while natural chamomile and lavender oil calm, soothe and cleanse damaged skin with anti-inflammatory protection. Unique purcellin oil reduces the thickness of the formula and makes application easy. While bio-oil skincare oil absorbs fast, take all the time you need to pamper your skin. Indulge in the relaxation of a little at-home massage and ultra-soft skin

Locks in essential moisture without clogging pores - While you feel locked indoors, use bio-oil skincare oil to lock-in radiant skin; Uniquely formulated, non-greasy body oil that hydrates skin and helps retain essential moisture. Helps repair scars without clogging your pores. Great for helping to heal Acne scars and as an anti-aging treatment.

Helps smooth uneven skin tones - works naturally with the texture and rhythm of your skin to help improve the appearance of your uneven skin tones for light and dark skin. Make bio-oil part of your new normal

Formulated for all skin types - and all rooms of the house; Keep bio-oil skincare oil on-hand to ensure the whole household is covered. Helps soften skin and repairs damage for all types, tones, textures and areas of your skin.

specifications.International Shipping: This item can be shipped to select countries outside of the U.S.
